summary: Provides unit tests for the RNNT greedy decoder when executed as a CUDA graph within NVIDIA NeMo ASR models, covering device switching, forced decoding mode, and loop label handling, and includes helper utilities to load various fastconformer transducer model configurations.
business_intent: Ensure that CUDA graph acceleration for RNNT greedy decoding is functionally correct and stable across different model sizes and execution scenarios, supporting reliable deployment of high‑performance speech‑to‑text services.
